Public Class XamlObjectWriter Inherits XamlWriter Implements IXamlLineInfoConsumer
public ref class XamlObjectWriter : System::Xaml::XamlWriter, System::Xaml::IXamlLineInfoConsumer
type XamlObjectWriter = class inherit XamlWriter interface IXamlLineInfoConsumer

summary.span: 从源 XAML 节点流创建对象图。

span.span: Creates an object graph from a source XAML node stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的`Write` 方法实现模式 , 以便使用由方法定义的。 The `Write` methods of implement a pattern so that the uses the that is defined by the method. 逻辑在`Write`方法之间切换, 具体取决于读取器中当前位置的节点类型。 logic switches between the `Write` methods, depending on which node type is at the current position in the reader. ## 范围Scope 具有作用域的概念; 即 , 在其输出对象关系图中维护一个概念点引用。 A has a concept of scope; that is, the maintains a conceptual point of reference in its output object graph. 对于特定范围, 某些操作可能有效或无效, 或者产生无操作结果。For a particular scope, certain operations might be valid or invalid, or produce a no-operation result. 例如, 如果您调用来编写在已作为实例存在的对象上进行初始化的指令, 则默认实现将引发异常。For example, if you call to write directives for initialization on an object that already exists as an instance, the default implementation throws an exception. 跟踪自定义中的作用域的可能方法是将节点操作与堆栈或帧类对齐。A possible technique for tracking scope in a custom is to align the node actions with a stack or frame class. 在写入对象图时, 堆栈或帧可以跟踪输入或退出的对象模型深度的每个级别的 push 和 pop。The stack or frame can keep track of push and pop for each level of object-model depth that is entered or exited while the writes the object graph. ## 回电Callbacks 为了支持中级和高级方案, 编写对象图的机制提供了在提交或将要提交特定操作时出现的回调入口点。To support intermediate and advanced scenarios, the mechanism of writing an object graph provides callback entry points that occur when a commits or is about to commit certain actions. 某些回调在设置中启用, 并且不特定于对象类型或被写入的成员;但是, 回调信息通常在上下文中提供, 或在通过回调发送的事件数据中提供。Some callbacks are enabled in the settings and are not specific to the object type or the member being written; however, callback information is often available in context or is in the event data that is sent through the callback. 下面是相关回调的列表:The following is a list of relevant callbacks: - 当作用域进入新对象时, 以及在对象生存期的每个所创建对象的阶段, 将调用由声明的回调。The callback that is declared by is invoked when the scope goes to a new object and at the phase of object lifetime for each created object. - 当作用域进入新对象时, 以及在对象生存期的每个所创建对象的阶段, 将调用由声明的回调。The callback that is declared by is invoked when the scope goes to a new object and at the phase of object lifetime for each created object. - 当作用域在对象中启动时, 将调用由声明的回调, 并在第一次调用该对象范围但尚未提交时发生。The callback that is declared by is invoked when the scope starts in an object, and occurs when the first call to that object scope is made but not yet committed. - 当作用域在对象中启动时, 将调用由声明的回调, 并在对该对象范围的调用但尚未提交时发生。The callback that is declared by is invoked when the scope starts in an object, and happens when the call to that object scope is made but not yet committed. - 当调用时 , 将调用由声明的回调。The callback that is declared by is invoked when is called. ## 写入字典键Writing Dictionary Keys 在将字典内容添加到对象图之前, 的默认实现支持对的约束的类型转换。The default implementation of supports type conversion on the constraints of a before the dictionary contents are added to the object graph. 通过这种方式, 一般字典可在运行时按对象进行键控, 并可与相关的`Add`泛型和索引器行为匹配。In this manner, a generic dictionary can be keyed at run time by objects and can match the relevant generic `Add` and indexer behavior. 但是, 在为基实现时, 此功能仅适用于从基类创建的对象图, 不适用于的派生类。However, as implemented for the base , this capability exists only for object graph creation from the base class and not for derived classes of . ## 检查是否已释放Checks for Disposed XAML 编写器可能用于延迟的操作, 或对已在中期中释放的 XAML 编写器实例进行调用的位置。XAML writers are potentially used for deferred operations or where a call is made against a XAML writer instance that has been disposed in the interim. 在这些情况下, 可能会引发的各种 api。Various APIs of might throw in these cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此`SetValue` XAML 编写器的操作具有关联的处理程序 ( 在中声明了), 则此方法将创建新的并将其传递给处理程序。If the `SetValue` operation for this XAML writer has an associated handler (a is declared in ), this method creates new and passes them to the handler. 返回值是通过读取通过事件数据传递的值来设置的。The return value is set by reading the value that is passed through the event data. 如果不存在处理程序并且调用了此方法, 则调用`false`将返回。If no handler exists and this method is invoked, the call returns `false`.

summary.span: 获取写入的最后一个对象。

span.span: Gets the last object that was written.

summary.span: 通常，仅在节点流位于结尾且对象关系图完整时才调用。

span.span: Typically only called when the node stream is at its end and the object graph is complete.

value.span: 写入的最后一个对象，或者为 。

span.span: The last object written, or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最常见的用法是仅当已知节点流的末尾时才调用此方法, 并且对象图已经完成。The most typical usage of is to call it only when the node stream is known to be at its end, and the object graph is complete. 否则, 对象图可能是不完整的, 在大多数平台方案中都不适用。Otherwise, the object graph is likely to be incomplete, and is not useful for most platform scenarios. 通常, 如果在调用后立即调用, 并且当前范围位于对象提供值的成员中, 则通常仅包含非 null 值。 typically only contains a non-null value if it is called immediately after a call to , and if the current scope is in the member where the object provides a value.

summary.span: 获取 服务，该服务为 XAML 对象编写器的绝对根节点维护 XAML 名称范围。

span.span: The service that maintains the XAML namescope for the current root of the object writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值可能来自对象编写器上下文。The value of this property may come from the object writer context.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SchemaContext As XamlSchemaContext
public: virtual property System::Xaml::XamlSchemaContext ^ SchemaContext { System::Xaml::XamlSchemaContext ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取活动 XAML 架构上下文。

span.span: Gets the active XAML schema context.
The XAML schema context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XAML 架构上下文是大多数实际对象编写方案必需的信息源。XAML schema context is a necessary information source for most practical object-writing scenarios. XAML 架构上下文会影响后备类型的类型查找, 并保存有关支持类型的程序集的信息。The XAML schema context influences the type lookup for backing types and holds information about the assemblies where backing types exist. 默认 XAML 架构上下文基于 CLR 类型映射规则。The default XAML schema context is based on CLR type-mapping rules. 框架通常提供自己的 XAML 架构上下文, 以确保程序集加载机制与框架的编程 amd 应用程序模型匹配。Frameworks typically provide their own XAML schema context in order to assure that the assembly-loading mechanisms match the framework's programming amd application models.

summary.span: 实现 ，并为异常提供行信息。

span.span: Implements and provides line information for exceptions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此服务方法不应在代码中直接调用。This service method is not intended to be called directly from your code. 但是, 如果要从创建派生类, 并希望报告某个行号不可用或不有用的上下文, 则可以调用此方法。However, if you are creating a derived class from and expect to report a context where line numbers are unavailable or not useful, this method may be called.

value.span: 如果行信息由编写器使用，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if line information is used by the writer; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现始终返回 `true`。This implementation always returns `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void WriteEndMember() cil managed

summary.span: 关闭当前成员范围，并且可能在关闭时写入成员范围的值。

span.span: Closes the current member scope, and may write the value of the member scope while it closes.

summary.span: 新范围将成为成员的父对象范围。

span.span: The new scope becomes the parent object scope of the member.

exception.span: 未能从在此调用和上一个 之间遇到的值节点创建成员值。

span.span: Failed to create member value from a value node that is encountered between this call and a previous .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void WriteEndObject() cil managed

summary.span: 关闭编写器中的当前对象范围。

span.span: Closes the current object scope in the writer.

summary.span: 新对象范围将成为的父成员范围。

span.span: The new object scope becomes the parent member scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此`EndObject`位置范围正在关闭根对象, 则新的对象范围将成为根范围。If this `EndObject` position scope is closing the root object, the new object scope becomes the root scope. 对的调用可能尚未创建对象, 因为对象成员可能是必需的初始化路径, 例如初始化文本或初始化参数。The call to might not yet have created the object because an object member might be a necessary initialization pathway, such as initialization text or initialization parameters. 对于这些情况, 调用实际上会写入对象。For these cases, the call to actually writes the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void WriteGetObject() cil managed

summary.span: 当指定对象是父属性的默认值或隐式值时，将概念 写入对象关系图。

span.span: Writes the conceptual into the object graph when the specified object is a default or implicit value of the parent property.

summary.span: 隐式值来自从 XAML 架构上下文中获取的信息以及后备类型信息，而不是指定为输入 XAML 节点集中的对象值。

span.span: The implicit value comes from information that is obtained from the XAML schema context and backing type information, instead of being specified as an object value in the input XAML node set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可在生成的对象图中查看通过编写和向写入的不同之处。The difference between writing with and writing with can be seen in the resulting object graph. 不构造类型的实例, 因为 API 没有信息来通知对象关系图的构造。 does not construct an instance of a type because the API has no information to inform the object graph of what to construct. 相反, 对象是在初始化父属性时创建的;因此, 不需要构造它。Instead, the object was created when the parent property was initialized; so a does not need to construct it. 相反, 指定应构造该类型的实例并将其插入到对象图中。In contrast, specifies that an instance of that type should be constructed and inserted into the object graph. 如果将 XAML 节点流视为一系列的帧, 则会将其平衡到调用。If you think of the XAML node stream as a series of frames, a is balanced to a call. 因此, 加上调用的次数应等于 XAML 节点流的完整对象写入计算的一部分的调用数。Therefore, the number of plus calls should equal the number of calls as part of a complete object-writing evaluation of the XAML node stream. 对象图`StartObject`中的隐式对象的概念位置是必需的, 因为虽然对象值本身是隐式默认值, 但该对象可能仍有需要基于 XAML 节点流编写的成员。The conceptual `StartObject` position for an implicit object in the object graph is necessary because although the object value itself is an implicit default, that object might still have members that need to be written based on the XAML node stream. 出现这种情况的典型方案是 : 为集合属性写入成员节点, 并且集合初始化是隐式的, 以创建拥有集合属性的对象。A typical scenario where this occurs is when writes member nodes for a collection property, and the collection initialization is implicit to creating the object that owns the collection property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void WriteNamespace(class System.Xaml.NamespaceDeclaration namespaceDeclaration) cil managed

param.name: namespaceDeclaration
param.span: 要写入的命名空间声明。

span.span: The namespace declaration to write.

summary.span: 定义一个命名空间声明，该声明适用于下一个对象范围或成员范围。

span.span: Defines a namespace declaration that applies to the next object scope or member scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前范围是根范围、对象范围或成员范围, 则可以编写命名空间声明。A namespace declaration can be written if the current scope is a root scope, object scope, or member scope. 但是, 只能在调用以下项之一之前调用: 、 或。However, can only be called immediately before a call to one of the following: , , or . 连续的情况是将多个命名空间声明写入同一节点。The consecutive case is for writing multiple namespace declarations to the same node. 最终, 必须调用或。Eventually, either or must be called. 不使用`Start` /比喻。`End` does not use a `Start`/`End` metaphor. 尽管 XAML 命名空间具有 CLR 表示法中的成员, 但这些成员是已知的, 无需表示为可扩展性的特殊类型 。Although a XAML namespace has members in the CLR representation sense, the members are known and do not need to be represented as a special type of for extensibility. 若要访问的值, 请访问其和属性。To access the values of a , you access its and properties. 命名空间声明可以具有前缀的值。A namespace declaration may have a value for the prefix. 前缀表示默认 XAML 命名空间的声明。A prefix represents a declaration of the default XAML namespace. 不要尝试使用 null 来表示默认前缀; 它在此 API 中引发异常。Do not attempt to use null to represent the default prefix; it throws an exception in this API. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

span.span: The is .
A component of is .

exception.span: 尝试在无效的范围中写入 XAML 命名空间节点。

span.span: Tried to write a XAML namespace node in an invalid scope.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void WriteStartMember(class System.Xaml.XamlMember property) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub WriteStartMember (property As XamlMember)

param.name: property
param.span: 要写入的 XAML 属性。

span.span: The XAML property to write.

param.span: 通常，您通过中间 XAML 节点流从 XAML 读取器中获取此值。

span.span: Typically you obtain this value from a XAML reader through the XAML node stream intermediate.

summary.span: 将新成员节点写入当前对象范围，并且该范围将成为新的成员范围。

span.span: Writes a new member node into the current object scope, and the scope becomes a new member scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!TIP] > 监视, 这在 xaml 输入中两次设置相同的 xaml 属性时发生。Watch for a , which occurs when the same XAML property is set twice in the XAML input. 在简单的情况下 (如在属性语法和属性元素语法中同时设置相同属性时), 可以轻松地在输入标记中看到此异常。In simple cases, such as when the same property is set in both attribute syntax and property element syntax, you can easily see this exception in the input markup. 但是, 可能会出现更难以发现的更多微妙情况。However, more subtle cases can occur that are more difficult to spot. 例如, 如果您设置了 xaml 内容属性 (包括 XAML 环境属性), 并且属性同时启用了可附加的用法和实例使用情况, 则可能会发生此异常。For example, this exception might occur if you set a XAML content property, if you involve XAML ambient properties, and if a property enables both an attachable usage and an instance usage. 在开发的调试阶段, 你通常可以通过查看连接标记读取和对象图写入的中间 XAML 节点表示形式来查找此异常。In the debugging phases of development, you can often locate this exception by viewing the intermediate XAML node representation that connects the markup read and the object graph write.

span.span: has set to .
-or-

exception.span: 传递，指示 XAML 节点流为不支持内容的对象包含内容。

span.span: passed, which indicates that the XAML node stream contained content for an object that does not support content.
-or-

exception.span: 尝试在无效的范围中写入开始成员。

span.span: Attempted to write a start member in an invalid scope.

summary.span: 将对象节点写入当前范围，并将该范围设置为新对象范围。

is .

para.span: 如果当前范围位于集合、字典或数组中, 则应使用相关类型的方法将新实例添加到集合、字典或数组。

span.span: If the current scope is inside a collection, dictionary, or array, the new instance should be added to the collection, dictionary, or array by using the method of the relevant type.

para.span: 否则, 应将成员分配给新的实例。

span.span: Otherwise, the member should be assigned to the new instance.
